case.name: SZFTS v Minister for Immigration and Multicultural Affairs [2006] FCA 1639 (16 November 2006)

citances.sentence: And whilst I confess that the words " SAAP " do not appear to fall from my lips in judgment they certainly fell from those of Jacobson J in the appeal of this matter ( SZFTS v Minister for Immigration [2006] FCA 1639) who said at [13]: "The other grounds of appeal are not particularised, but the applicant expanded upon them in written submissions.
